intent_atoms.description: Reorganize NavigationSplitView layout by moving Selection Details and Integrity Summary to the Inspector column with a toggle control in the Content panel header.
Selection Details fully functional in third column (Inspector).
Integrity Summary toggleable via button on Box Tree panel header.
4+ UI snapshot tests for responsive layouts.
Bug #232 must be fixed before Task 243 end‑to‑end testing begins.
Use existing NavigationSplitScaffold pattern to implement three‑column layout; no new dependencies required.
InspectorDetailView container will host Selection Details and Integrity Summary.
Toggle state management implemented via InspectorDetailState observable.
Responsive design handled for 360‑700pt widths with compact/regular size classes.
Accessibility features (VoiceOver, dynamic type, keyboard shortcuts) integrated in each phase.
